entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Kuujjuarapik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kuujjuarapik Airport 02:58 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.2°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -13.2°C
Wind: SSE 26 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and blowing snow beginning early this evening. Blizzard developing near midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Blizzard. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near noon then snow and blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
